column2: "Na ɔhyɛɛ ase kasaa kyerɛɛ hɔn abɛbu mu dɛ
column4: na ɔgyee ho ban hyiae

column2: "Na ber durii no
column3: ɔsomaa akowaa bi wɔ ekuafo no hɔ dɛ ɔnkɛgye wenyin ture eduaba no bi wɔ ekuafo no hɔ mbra."

column2: "Na ekuafo no kyeer no hwee no
"Na bio ɔsomaa akowaa fofor wɔ hɔn hɔ
column3: na wɔbobɔɔ ne tsir pirapiraa no
column4: na woguu n’enyim ase."

column2: "Na ɔsanee somaa ɔfofor so; na ɔno dze
column4: nna afofor pii so: wɔhwee binom na wokum binom."

column2: "Nna ɔwɔ obi so wɔ hɔ a ɔno yɛ no dɔba; na ekyir no ɔsomaa ɔno so wɔ hɔn hɔ
column4: Wɔbɛfɛr me ba."

column2: "Na ekuafo no dze
column4: Odziadzenyi no nye yi: hom mbra ma yenku no

column2: "Na wɔkyeer no kum no
column3: na wɔtoow no fii wenyin ture mu hɔ kyenee."

column2: "Dɛm a nna ebɛnadze na wenyin ture no wura bɛyɛ? Ɔbɛba abɛsɛɛ ekuafo no
column3: na ɔdze wenyin ture no ama afofor."

column2: "Ana hom nnkenkaan kyerɛw yi pɛn dɛ
column4: Ɔnoara na

column2: "Iyi Ewuradze na Ɔayɛ
column3: Na ɔyɛ nwanwa wɔ hɛn enyiwa do?"

column2: "Na wɔpɛɛ dɛ nkyɛ wɔkyer no; osiandɛ wohun dɛ bɛ yi a obui no tsia hɔn; naaso wosuroo nyimpadodow no ntsi wogyaa no hɔ kɔree."
"Na wɔsomaa Farisiifo nye Herod akadofo no mu bi dɛ wonkodua ne kasaa do mfa nsun no efir nkyer no."
"Na wɔbae no wɔsee no dɛ
column4: yenyim dɛ eyɛ nokwafo
column5: na ennyɛ nyimpa enyim nhwehwɛmu; eso innsuro nyimpa enyim asɛnka
column6: na ekyerɛkyerɛ Nyankopɔn no kwan no wɔ nokwar mu. Ana ɔfa mbra mu dɛ yɛyi ntoboa ma Kaesar anaa oho?"

column2: "Yɛmma anaa mma yɛmma? Na ohun hɔn ndabraba no ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze ntsi na hom rosɔ me ahwɛ yi? Hom mfa sika denare mbrɛ me ma monhwɛ."

column2: "Na wɔdze bae. Na obisaa hɔn dɛ
column3: Woana no mfonyi nye akyerɛw nye yi? Na wɔsee no dɛ
column4: Kaesar dze a."

column2: "Na Jesus see hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom mfa dza ɔyɛ Kaesar dze mma Kaesar
column4: na dza ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn dze mma Nyankopɔn. Na no ho yɛɛ hɔn nwanwa dodow."

column2: "Na Sadusiifo so bi a wɔka dɛ wunyan nnyi hɔ no baa ne nkyɛn; na wobisaa no dɛ
"Kyerɛkyerɛfo
column4: Sɛ obi no nua wu na ogya ne yer
column6: no nua nwar ne yer no na ɔnwo mba mma no nua."

column2: "Na enuanom beesuon wɔ hɔ: na nyia odzi kan no waar yer
column4: oenngya mba;"

column2: "na nyia otsia ebien no waar no
column4: na no so enngya mba; nyia otsia ebiasa no dɛmara;"

column2: "na beesuon no enngya mba. Ne nyina ekyir no
"Na wunyan no mu
column3: hɔn mu woana na ɔbɛyɛ ne yer? Osiandɛ beesuon no awar no."

column2: "Jesus see hɔn dɛ
column3: Ana nnyɛ yi ntsi na hom fom yi
column4: dɛ hom nnyim kyerɛwsɛm no nye Nyankopɔn no tum no so?"

column2: "Na wɔsoɛr fi ewufo mu a
column4: na wɔtse dɛ abɔfo a wɔwɔ sor."

column2: "Na ewufo ho no dze
column4: ana hom nnkenkaan no wɔ Moses nwoma no mu
column5: mbrɛ Nyankopɔn kasaa kyerɛɛ no wɔ Haban no mu dɛ

column2: "Ampaara
column4: mbom enyikamfo Nyankopɔn a: dɛm ntsi hom fom pii."

column2: "Na kyerɛwfo no mu baako bae bɛtsee dɛ woribisabisa nsɛm no
column3: na ohun dɛ Jesus ebua hɔn yie no
column4: obisaa no dɛ
column5: Mbransɛm no nyina dza ɔwɔ hen na odzi kan?"

column2: "Jesus buaa dɛ
column3: Dza odzi kan no nye dɛ
column4: Israel
column5: tsie: Ewuradze hɛn Nyankopɔn nye Ewuradze kor:"

column2: "na dɔ Ewuradze wo Nyankopɔn wɔ w’akoma nyina mu nye wo kra nyina mu
column4: nye w’ahoɔdzen nyina mu."

column2: "Na dza otsia ebien no nye yi: Dɔ wo nyɛnko dɛ wankasa wo ho. Mbrasɛm biara nnyi hɔ a ɔso kyɛn yinom."
"Na kyerɛwnyi no see no dɛ
column4: ampa aka no yie dɛ Nyankopɔn yɛ kor; na obi nnyi hɔ dɛ ɔno nko."

column2: "Na dɛ ebɔdɔ no wɔ w’akoma nyina mu
column4: nye w’ahoɔdzen nyina mu
column5: na ebɔdɔ wo nyɛnko dɛ wankasa wo ho no

column2: "Na Jesus hun dɛ oebua nyansa mu no
column4: Ɔwo na Nyankopɔn n’ahenman no ntamu nntwe. Na obiara ennsi no bo dɛ obebisa no asɛm bi bio."

column2: "Na Jesus rekyerɛkyerɛ wɔ asɔrfi no mu no
column4: Ɔyɛ dɛn na kyerɛwfo no ka dɛ Kraest no yɛ David ba?"

column2: "Na David nankasa nam Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn mu ka dɛ
column4: Tsena m’abanyimfa Kodu dɛ medze w’atamfo mebɛyɛ w’ananadzegua."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi David noara frɛ no Ewuradze; na ofi hen bɛyɛɛ ne ba?  Nna nyimpadodow nyina dze enyigye tsiee no."
"Na ɔkae wɔ ne nkyerɛkyerɛ mu dɛ
column3: Hom nhwɛ yie wɔ akyerɛwfo a wɔpɛ ntar atsentsen mu nantsew
column4: nye gua do nkyiakyia;"

column2: "ɔnye mpanyin gua wɔ nhyiamudan mu
column3: nye mpanyin tsenabea wɔ edzidzi ase ho:"

column2: "hɔn na wɔbɔ ekunafo epoo
column3: na wopetuw bɔ mpaa atsentsen kyerɛ: mese
column4: woyinom benya afɔbu kɛsenara."

column2: "Na ɔtsenaa ase wɔ sikakorabea no ne tsentsendo na ɔhwɛɛ mbrɛ nyimpadodow no sii dze sika guu sikakorabea no mu; na dodow a wɔyɛ ahonyafo no dze pii guu mu."
"Na ɔbaa kunafo hianyi bi so bae bɔtoow mpɛsewamba ebien a wɔbɛyɛ pɛsewa kor guu mu."
"Na Jesus frɛɛ n’esuafo see hɔn dɛ
column3: Meka no nokwar mu kyerɛ hom dɛ
column4: okunafo hianyi yi dze pii ebogu mu akyɛn hɔn a wɔdze bi ebogu sikakorabea no mu no nyina:"

column2: "osiandɛ hɔn nyina dza wɔwɔ ma abor hɔn do no
column4: na oyi dze
column5: ofi ne hia mu dze dza ɔwɔ nyina
column6: n’asetsena nyina na ɔdze ebogu mu."
